Metadata.title: Frequently Asked Questions | Sahla LMS
Metadata.description: Find answers to the most common questions about Sahla. Learn about account management, platform features, and more.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Have a question? We've probably answered it below.

platformFeatures.title: Platform Features
platformFeatures.a1: Sahla is a multi-tenant, web-based Learning Management System (LMS) that allows you to launch your own branded online learning platform with unique subdomains.
platformFeatures.a2: Sahla offers comprehensive course management, integrated payment processing via Stripe, user authentication, an administrative dashboard with analytics, and a customizable landing page.
platformFeatures.q3: Can I customize my learning platform?
platformFeatures.a3: Yes, Sahla provides a visual, drag-and-drop landing page editor powered by Puck, allowing you to customize your public-facing landing page without writing code.
platformFeatures.a4: Yes, Sahla integrates with the Judge0 API for executing user-submitted code in various programming languages, enabling interactive coding challenges.
platformFeatures.q5: Can Sahla help with quiz generation?
platformFeatures.a5: Absolutely! Sahla leverages OpenRouter integration for AI-powered quiz question generation, making content creation easier and faster.

pricing.title: Pricing & Subscription
pricing.q1: What are the pricing plans for Sahla?
pricing.a1: We offer various pricing plans tailored to different needs, including Basic, Pro, and Enterprise options. Please visit our pricing page for more details.
pricing.q2: Do you offer a free trial?
pricing.a2: Yes, we offer a free trial period for you to explore Sahla's features before committing to a subscription.
pricing.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.a3: We accept all major credit cards through our secure Stripe integration.
pricing.a4: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on our subscription plans. Please refer to our Terms and Conditions for more details.

support.title: Technical Support
support.a1: You can reach out to us via our contact page, or refer to our help center for common issues and guides.
support.a2: API access is available with our Enterprise plan, allowing for deeper integration and customization.
support.q3: What kind of technical assistance can I expect?
support.a3: Our technical support team is available to assist with platform setup, troubleshooting, and any technical queries you may have to ensure a smooth experience.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

Metadata.title: Privacy Policy | Sahla
Metadata.description: Learn how Sahla collects, uses, and protects your personal data.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information with complete transparency.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information you provide (name, email, profile), payment details, learning progress, support communications, and technical data (IP address, browser, device info) to improve our services.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your data to provide our services, process payments, personalize learning, send updates, provide support, analyze usage, and ensure security.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share data only with instructors (for course progress), service providers (under confidentiality), for legal compliance, with your consent, or during business transfers.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We use encryption, secure authentication, regular audits, and access controls to protect your data. However, no system is 100% secure.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential, performance, functional, and analytics cookies. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You can access, update, delete your data, opt out of marketing, request data portability, and withdraw consent through your account dashboard.

contact.title: Contact Our Privacy Team
contact.description: Have questions about this Privacy Policy? Our dedicated privacy team is here to help you understand how we protect your data.

cta.title: Manage Your Privacy Settings
cta.description: Take control of your data and privacy preferences through your personalized account dashboard.
